actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include as creditable service for purposes of the civil service retirement system certain periods of service by individuals before the date they were employed by the Panama Canal Company or the Panama Railroad Company.

summary.text: Permits employees of the Panama Canal Company or the Panama Railroad Company to elect to designate prior service for which such individuals received credit under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 as creditable service for purposes of Federal civil service retirement benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include as creditable service for purposes of the civil service retirement system certain periods of service by individuals before the date they were employed by the Panama Canal Company or the Panama Railroad Company.
